pr_title: RM11555 : Replaced saleMinPrice per maxPurchasePrice in purchase order lines

timeline.message: Replaced saleMinPrice per maxPurchasePrice in purchase order lines view form

timeline.bodyText:
Changelog is not meant only for technical people. Avoid using technical names of field and make a more "verbal" description of the change.
(Also grammar nazi : use "replaced by" instead of "replaced per").
timeline.author: wde-axelor
